metadata.title: CVE-2019-12209 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Yubico pam-u2f 1.0.7 attempts parsing of the configured authfile (default$HOME/.config/Yubico/u2f_keys) as root (unless openasuser was enabled), anddoes not properly verify that the path lacks symlinks pointing to otherfiles on the system owned by root. If the debug option is enabled in thePAM configuration, part of the file contents of a symlink target will belogged, possibly revealing sensitive information.

criterions.comment: pam-u2f: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
